meanings.definition: A family of nonvenomous snakes, typically having slender bodies and smooth scales.
meanings.sent1: Colubrids are known for their slender bodies and smooth scales.
meanings.sent2: I saw a colubrid at the zoo with a long, thin body and shiny scales.
meanings.sent3: The colubrids at the reptile exhibit were having a race to see who could slither the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the colubrids moved gracefully through the grass like flowing ribbons.
meanings.sent5: The colubrids in the pet store were so colorful and beautiful, I couldn't stop staring at them.

meanings.definition: A type of snake belonging to the Colubridae family.
meanings.sent1: The colubrids in the exhibit were all from the same snake family.
meanings.sent2: My friend has a pet colubrid that belongs to the Colubridae family.
meanings.sent3: I dreamt that the colubrids threw a family reunion party in the snake pit.
meanings.sent4: The colubrids slithered together in harmony, like a close-knit family.
meanings.sent5: The colubrids from the Colubridae family were the stars of the reptile show.
